settings.title: Exclusive Discounts
settings.content:
• Priority access to up to 50% off limited-stock items
  • Members-Only discounts or new product trials
  • Free Product Giveaways from time to time

settings.title: Exclusive Customer Services
settings.content:
• An extended warranty of six months or one year
  • Exclusive Voice Customer Service
  • Holiday Benefits for Birthdays, Black Friday, and Xmas

settings.title: Tips & Tricks on Offline Vendors
settings.content:
• Exhibition of Offline Vendors tips and exclusive E-book content delivered
  • Access guides and advice from vendor experts
  • Membership in a Supportive vendor Community

settings.title: More Discounts for Every Vendor
settings.text:
Exclusive discounts, vouchers, and gifts for all Vendors!

Perfect for vendors entering their first event, those who want to boost sales after a few shows, and those who felt overwhelmed in the past. Our resources help reduce event-day stress, ensuring you feel confident and calm for your next market. Whether you're a beginner or experienced, we provide the tools you need to succeed.
settings.link_text: Register for Being a Vendor Benefits
settings.title2: Discover the Benefits of Being a Registered Vendor
settings.text2: Register to unlock exclusive vendor benefits including significant discounts, personalized customer service, and expert advice.
